Package ws.myGraph

Class GraphUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • ws.myGraph.GraphUtils
  • public class GraphUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    A class with utility functions for reading, storing ad plotting graphs.
    It uses JGraphT and graphviz-java.

    • Constructor Summary

      GraphUtils()

      • loadDS1Graph

        public static org.jgrapht.Graph<MyVertex,​MyEdgeDS1> loadDS1Graph​(java.lang.String name)
                                                                throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                       org.jgrapht.io.ImportException,
                                                                       java.net.URISyntaxException
        Read a Graph from a DOT file, relative to DS2.
        Parameters:
        name - The file name for the graph to be loaded.
        Returns:
        The Graph contained in the input file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if it can't read the given file.
        org.jgrapht.io.ImportException - if it can't import the graph from the given file.
        java.net.URISyntaxException - if raised by Utils.getNewFile(String, String, String)).

      • saveDS1Graph

        public static java.io.File saveDS1Graph​(org.jgrapht.Graph<MyVertex,​MyEdgeDS1> graph,
                                        java.lang.String name)
                                 throws org.jgrapht.io.ExportException,
                                        java.io.IOException,
                                        java.net.URISyntaxException
        Persistently store a graph relative to DS1 into a DOT file.
        Parameters:
        graph - The input graph from DS1.
        name - The name to be used to store the DOT file with the serialized graph.
        Returns:
        A File containing the input graph, serialize in DOT format.
        Throws:
        org.jgrapht.io.ExportException - if it can't export the graph to the given file.
        java.io.IOException - if it can't create a FileWriter for the output file with the given name.
        java.net.URISyntaxException - if raised by Utils.getNewFile(String, String, String)).

      • writeImage

        public static void writeImage​(java.io.File dot,
                              java.lang.String path,
                              java.lang.String name)
                       throws java.io.IOException,
                              java.net.URISyntaxException
        Creates and stores a plot of the graph written into the given DOT file. It uses Graphviz to read the graph and produce the plot.
        Parameters:
        dot - The DOT file containing the serialized graph.
        path - The path where to save the produced image.
        name - The name to give to the produced image.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if can't read the input file.
        java.net.URISyntaxException - if raised by Utils.getNewFile(String, String, String)).

      • writeImage

        public static void writeImage​(java.io.File dot,
                              java.lang.String path,
                              java.lang.String name,
                              java.util.List<java.lang.String> nodes)
                       throws java.io.IOException,
                              java.net.URISyntaxException
        Creates and stores a plot of the graph written into the given DOT file, the given nodes are colored. It uses Graphviz to read the graph and produce the plot.
        Parameters:
        dot - The DOT file containing the serialized graph.
        path - The path where to save the produced image.
        name - The name to give to the produced image.
        nodes - The keys that identify the nodes to be colored in the output plot.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if can't read the input file.
        java.net.URISyntaxException - if raised by Utils.getNewFile(String, String, String)).

      • writeImage

        public static void writeImage​(java.io.File dot,
                              java.lang.String path,
                              java.lang.String name,
                              java.util.Map<?,​java.util.Set<java.lang.String>> nodes)
                       throws java.io.IOException,
                              java.net.URISyntaxException
        Creates and stores a plot of the graph written into the given DOT file, the given nodes are colored such that nodes in the same topic have the same color, and seeds are rectangular. It uses Graphviz to read the graph and produce the plot.
        Parameters:
        dot - The DOT file containing the serialized graph.
        path - The path where to save the produced image.
        name - The name to give to the produced image.
        nodes - A map of seeds and infected nodes, the seeds can be strings or sets of strings (in case more topics were merged in a single one).
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if can't read the input file.
        java.net.URISyntaxException - if raised by Utils.getNewFile(String, String, String)).

      • writeImage

        public static void writeImage​(org.jgrapht.Graph g,
                              java.lang.String path,
                              java.lang.String name)
                       throws java.net.URISyntaxException,
                              javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
        Creates and stores a plot of the given graph. It uses JGraphXAdapter and mxCellRenderer to read the graph and produce the plot.
        Parameters:
        g - The input graph.
        path - The path where to save the produced image.
        name - The name to give to the produced image.
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - if raised by Utils.getNewFile(String, String, String)).
        javax.xml.transform.TransformerException - if can't actually write the current image.

      • authorsPageRank

        public static java.util.Map<MyVertex,​java.lang.Double> authorsPageRank​(java.lang.String year)
                                                                      throws org.jgrapht.io.ImportException,
                                                                             java.io.IOException,
                                                                             java.net.URISyntaxException
        Commodity function to compute the page rank of a DS2 graph (i.e., the scores of the authors).
        Parameters:
        year - The year of the graph whose PageRank is to be computed.
        Returns:
        The PageRank scores of the given graph.
        Throws:
        org.jgrapht.io.ImportException - if raised by loadDS2Graph(String)
        java.io.IOException - if raised by loadDS2Graph(String)
        java.net.URISyntaxException - if raised by loadDS2Graph(String)

      • getGraphMap

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> getGraphMap​(java.lang.String year)
                                                                          throws org.jgrapht.io.ImportException,
                                                                                 java.io.IOException,
                                                                                 java.net.URISyntaxException
        Produces a map id -> value for the nodes of the graph of the given year in DS1.
        Parameters:
        year - The year of the graph whose map is to be computed.
        Returns:
        A map id -> value for the nodes of the graph of the given year in DS1.
        Throws:
        org.jgrapht.io.ImportException - if raised by loadDS1Graph(String)
        java.io.IOException - if raised by loadDS1Graph(String)
        java.net.URISyntaxException - if raised by loadDS1Graph(String)
